hackathon-description-text: The signature 24-hour Hackathon host by Microsoft Student Partners (MSP) in Hong Kong, will let you assemble your team, build your solution demo and gear up for the Imagine Cup competition in Hong Kong. Imagine Hack will be held from January 20-21, 2018.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Group Manager, Student Developer Evangelism, C&E Engineering, Microsoft

hackathon-rules: Competition Rules & Regulations will be the same as Imagine Cup 2018

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Fast track nomination to Imagine Cup HK Semi-Final for Elite 8 Teams
The Most Innovative Award - Total worth of HKD 200 cash coupon, AND ONE Arc Touch Bluetooth Mouse

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Cyberport Four, 100 Cyberport Rd, Telegraph Bay, Hong Kong

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
• Does the project make effective and appropriate use of the major features of its chosen platform(s)? 
• Does the project include innovations in technical design and/or implementation? 
• Does the project include innovations in user experience?

• Does the project create a new category of product or service? 
• Does the project clearly and meaningfully innovate beyond existing products or services?

•Does the project have a clear target market or audience?
•Does the project address a clear need, problem, or opportunity and is the solution clearly explained?
•Is the project’s purpose and basic functionality easily understood?

•Does the team have a credible plan for getting their project to market?
•Does the team have any form of external validation for their project?
•Does the project have a reasonable chance of success in its appropriate market given the team’s existing plan?

hackathon-location-address: Cyberport Four, 100 Cyberport Rd, Telegraph Bay, Hong Kong
hackathon-location-description: SMART-SPACE FinTech - Level 4 Core E Cyberport 3
